name: Mercer Mayer's Little Critter and the Great Race
name_original: Mercer Mayer's Little Critter and the Great Race
description:
Mercer Mayer's Little Critter and the Great Race is an adventure game developed by Big Tuna New Media. It came out on 01-03-2002. Infogrames published the game.
You can play Mercer Mayer's Little Critter and the Great Race on PC.
